title: Crew Show! (Q&A, Hellcat Durango, BMW M440i, Ferrari update)
description:
Matt Farah and Zack Klapman catch up on what they've been driving, including  the Hellcat Durango, an old Ferrari, and the new BMW M440i. Plus, they answer your questions.
